zh: 我们先从这个问题开始吧。

en: This question is too difficult for me to answer.
zh: 这个问题太难了，我回答不上来。

en: The answer to this question is wrong.
zh: 这个问题的答案是错的。

en: This alarm clock gains one minute a day.
zh: 这个闹钟每天快一分钟。

en: These trees will screen our new house from public view.
zh: 这些树能挡住我们的新房子，不让外面看到。

en: This tree measures three meters around.
zh: 这棵树的周长有三米。

en: This tree bears no fruit.
zh: 这棵树不结果子。

en: This tree does not bear fruit.
zh: 这棵树不结果。

en: This tree is tall, but that one is even taller.
zh: 这棵树挺高的，但那一棵更高。

en: This tree bears a lot of good fruit.
zh: 这棵树结了很多好果子。

en: This wood won't burn.
zh: 这木头烧不着。

en: How tall this tree is!
zh: 这棵树可真高啊！

en: This tree is the tallest and oldest in this forest.
zh: 这棵树是这片林子里最高、最老的。

en: This tree is the same age as that one.
zh: 这棵树跟那一棵树龄一样。

en: This tree is about as tall as that one.
zh: 这棵树跟那一棵差不多高。

en: This tree is about as high as that one.
zh: 这棵树和那一棵的高度差不多。

en: This tree has been standing for five decades.
zh: 这棵树已经在这儿长了五十年了。

en: The top of this tree is level with the fence.
zh: 这棵树的顶端跟篱笆一样高。

en: This tree bears good peaches every year.
zh: 这棵树每年都结好吃的桃子。

en: Hold fast to this tree.
zh: 抓紧这棵树。

en: This net here is to keep off mosquitoes.
zh: 这个网是用来防蚊子的。

en: These cotton socks bear washing well.
zh: 这些棉袜很耐洗。

en: This cotton shirt washes well.
zh: 这件棉衬衫很耐洗。

en: This maze is very hard to get out of.
zh: 这个迷宫很难走出来。

en: What is the correct aperture in this light?
zh: 这种光线下，合适的光圈是多少？

en: You'll strain your eyes trying to read in this light.
zh: 在这种光线下看书会看坏眼睛的。

en: This order is to be obeyed to the letter.
zh: 这个命令必须严格执行。

en: Does she come from the agency that sent the last temporary I had?
zh: 她是派了上一个临时工的那家中介公司的人吗？

en: I can't see the road signs in this fog.
zh: 雾太大，我看不清路标。

en: I want to find out the source of this irresponsible rumor.
zh: 我想找出这个不负责任的谣言的源头。

en: The eternal silence of these infinite spaces terrifies me.
zh: 这些无尽空间的永恒寂静让我感到恐惧。

en: This dream will come true.
zh: 这个梦想会成真的。

en: The origins of these people is shrouded in mystery.
zh: 这些人的起源充满了神秘色彩。

en: This miso soup is too hot to drink.
zh: 这碗味噌汤太烫了，没法喝。

en: The taste of sugar is too noticeable.
zh: 糖的味道太重了。
